<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/309976ec1f033c68480bbc8cc363db5b5ea944f9|patch 8.1.2390: test94 is old style, fix 7.4.441 not tested>
patch 8.1.2390: test94 is old style, fix 7.4.441 not tested

Problem:    Test94 is old style, fix 7.4.441 not tested.
Solution:   Turn test94 into a new style test.  Add tests for the fix in patch
            7.4.441. (Yegappan Lakshmanan, closes #5316)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2390: test94 is old style, fix 7.4.441 not tested · vim/vim@309976e

attachments.text: Problem: Test94 is old style, fix 7.4.441 not tested. Solution: Turn test94 into a new style test. Add tests for the fix in patch 7.4.441. (Yegappan Lakshmanan, closes #5316)

patch 8.1.2391: cannot build when __QNXNTO__ is defined

Problem:    Cannot build when __QNXNTO__ is defined. (Ian Wayne Larson)
Solution:   Move the check for "qansi". (Ken Takata, closes #5317)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/e7dd0deb3c4c4b1f55e28e5fe9a4ef4b76951b85|patch 8.1.2397: should not define __USE_XOPEN>
patch 8.1.2397: should not define __USE_XOPEN

Problem:    Should not define __USE_XOPEN. _XOPEN_SOURCE is not needed for
            Android.
Solution:   Remove __USE_XOPEN and adjust #ifdefs. (Ozaki Kiichi,
            closes #5322)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2397: should not define __USE_XOPEN · vim/vim@e7dd0de
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2397: should not define __USE_XOPEN · vim/vim@e7dd0de
attachments.text: Problem: Should not define __USE_XOPEN. _XOPEN_SOURCE is not needed for Android. Solution: Remove __USE_XOPEN and adjust #ifdefs. (Ozaki Kiichi, closes #5322)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/9a838fe543b69582b0773f7c38a57f16fb32d765|patch 8.1.2398: strptime() test fails on Japanese Mac>
patch 8.1.2398: strptime() test fails on Japanese Mac

Problem:    strptime() test fails on Japanese Mac.
Solution:   Use %T instead of %X.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2398: strptime() test fails on Japanese Mac · vim/vim@9a838fe
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2398: strptime() test fails on Japanese Mac · vim/vim@9a838fe
attachments.text: Problem: strptime() test fails on Japanese Mac. Solution: Use %T instead of %X.
